programme.title: The Village Girl I Love
programme.desc: Adugo and Benson are madly in love, but this is disrupted by Bensons mum who makes sure that she ends the relationship and propose another woman to her son.

programme.title: Vacant Throne
programme.desc: In a kingdom where sitting on the vacant throne means death, suitors flock to win Princess Ugomas hand, all seeking access to power.

programme.title: Lauras Tears
programme.desc: After Laura lost her mom and dad, her aunt makes her a toy to every man in the community.This eventually led to her death, but her spirit will not rest until she gets justice.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Wrong Couple
programme.desc: Omenaokolobia, the chosen king declines the throne of Umu Okpa due to uncertainties surrounding the crown. However, the chiefs are determined to seize power.

programme.title: My Life My Fate
programme.desc: Ebere and Nene suffer a great deal in the hands of the villagers who want to take advantage of them, but everything change when Maduka shows up.

programme.title: Please Marry Me
programme.desc: After Ramos comes to the city to meet and squat with his friend, he meets Belinda who has been tasked to get married through an accident. This encounter is about to change his life forever.

programme.title: Olanma My Love
programme.desc: Olanma turns down Ebubes love when he professed it to her. Ebube leaves her for Ene and she cannot handle this as she will do everything to get him back.

programme.title: My Pet Wife
programme.desc: Chief divorce his wife because she couldnt bear him a son, now he is married to a Pet wife. This decision is about to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Forever Despite
programme.desc: Despite the warnings of her mother, Ngoli gives birth out of wedlock for Uzor who abandons her in the village. This causes more suffering. Will he return for her?

programme.title: My College Girls
programme.desc: Teacher Tony, a dedicated and disciplined educator, would do anything to help his students excel through. However, everything changes when one of his students became pregnant.

programme.title: Beyond Forgiveness
programme.desc: After Obinna lost is ability to get a woman pregnant, he banks on faith and fate, but he is not ready to believe his wife when the time comes.

programme.title: City Husband
programme.desc: Chekwube is going through a lot in her fathers hands because she refuse to bring home a befitting husband for home.

programme.title: Ti-Ghana Island
programme.desc: War breaks out TI Island as the kingpin wants Alex to marry his troublesome daughter and leaves his lover. Will Alex accept the offer?

programme.title: On My Wish
programme.desc: Arinze adamantly prevents anyone from burying his father, fearing suspicion of his involvement in a cult. For nearly two years, he faces relentless attacks for his decision.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nnanna and Adanna make a decision that changes their fate, Ojigijaga meddles with the gods. .

programme.title: Dunu-Okofia
programme.desc: During the great festival of Dunukofia, a young man is about to go to war for the sake of the woman he loves. However, his grandfather reveals to him the story of his ancestors.

programme.title: But Why Her
programme.desc: Freds attitude to life is crazy, and he takes it from his father. Without correction he gets worse and his mother is up against his father sleeping with their maid.

programme.title: Just A Miss-Take
programme.desc: Chucks falls in love with Amaka without knowing that it is Amara, her twin. Now the truth is out, will he marry Amara or fight back for Amaka?

programme.title: One Man
programme.desc: Nkechi and Amara are sisters who love each other but are separated because of poverty. They will unite again just for Nkechi to do the unthinkable.

programme.title: The Wizards Love
programme.desc: Onyinye longs for marriage, but a deadly vow binds her to a powerful wizard, and breaking it may cost her life.

programme.title: Sacrifice For Royalty
programme.desc: Nneka sacrifice her education for her man, Prince Gozie, this love makes him promise her marriage. Will he keep to that promise?

programme.title: Love Unbound
programme.desc: With her daughter adding to her troubles and Mmasi making strides in his life, Helen grapples with the weight of her past actions while her future hangs precariously in the balance.

programme.title: Crazy Kind Of Love
programme.desc: A rich American base returnee is crazily in love with a younger spinster who finds him unattractive as she believes true love cannot be found where it does not exist or stay.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man evades an arranged marriage to go to Shaolin Temple, where he joins other disciples to fight against an expelled disciple taking revenge on the Abbot.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Grave robbing archeologists discover vampires immobilized by paper spells. While transporting them, the vampires revive and escape. A local herbalist sets out to destroy them.

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: A tough and rebellious girl is recruited by the CIA and trained to be a deadly assassin. Her life changes when she gets to know about real life from killing.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and her daughter move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, dark secrets and horror have raided each family from the inside.

programme.title: Kungfu Cyborg: Metallic Attraction
programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: Yesterday Once More
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs To, a pair of divorced professional jewel thieves, target to steal the same ruby necklace. A cat-and-mouse game begins as their love re-blossoms along the way.

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: When an important witness and his family are brutally murdered, a furious and disillusioned lawyer decides to dish out his own vigilante justice with his fist.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: Chen Zhen fights against the Black Dragon Society, who uses his comrades to test a new drug used to boost the strength of the Japanese troops in war.

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover detective is assigned to take down a triad boss, but as their friendship develops over time, the detective is torn between duty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: Hong Kongs up-and-coming actor William Chan stars as a gangster who rise through the ranks to become the no. 1 triad gangster in Hong Kong!

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: In this classic martial arts comedy, Sammo Hung stars as Lam Sai Wing, the disciple of Wong Fei Hung, who gets embroiled in a feud with a rival kung fu school.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: The Moon Warrior
programme.desc: A benevolent fisherman living a simple life is reluctantly drawn into helping a noble emperor regain his throne from his evil brother.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: House of Fury
programme.desc: When their father disappears, sparring siblings Nicky and Natalie embark on a mission to look for their lost family member.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When Sergeant Lo loses his police revolver to four young triad thugs, he enlists the help of PTU Sergeant Ho and his patrol team to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Fatty helps his friend Wah to learn martial arts from his Wing Chun master, so that Wah can take down the villains and avenge his mothers death.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxers spirit in his master?

programme.title: Gun N Rose
programme.desc: A Taiwanese gang boss names his adopted son Long Yi as successor, provoking his biological son Long Er to murder him. Long Yi must now confront Long Er in a final battle.

programme.title: Life Without Principle
programme.desc: A criminal, a bank officer and a cop are forced to abandon their morals and principles to solve their financial problems.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Adapted from real events, the story is about a police special team fighting underground criminal organizations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.

programme.title: The Dead And The Deadly
programme.desc: A murderous plot to claim the fortune of a wealthy family is thwarted when the spirit of the victim enters the body of a young sorcerer to take revenge.

programme.title: Confession Of Pain
programme.desc: As Detective Heis father-in-law was murdered, his wife enlists the help of private detective Bong to uncover the truth, which may be linked to Hei.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty III
programme.desc: Two notorious thieves escape to Hong Kong after committing a jewellery heist in Japan. Madam Yeung and a Japanese inspector must team up to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey Of A Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Nui uses his boxing skills to help the weak fight villains. He accepts a death combat challenge so as to take revenge for his friend.

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, an all-female police squad encounters sexism and conflicts during training, but must band together to take down a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: At the dawn of 1997, three notorious Hong Kong thieves coincidentally meet in a restaurant, sparking rumours of a huge heist before the Handover unbeknownst to them.

programme.title: Eclats De Vie
programme.desc: Lidylle entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face son entourage, fait resurgir de lourds secrets.

programme.title: Passions Troubles
programme.desc: A la mort mysterieuse dun homme daffaires puissant, lepouse de lun de ses employes, son amie de frache date et son amant sont suspectes.

programme.title: Les Filles De Madame Garcia
programme.desc: Une femme espre que sa fille deviendra une mannequin celbre et fait tout parvenir ses ambitions, mais elle sengage dans un chemin difficile.

programme.desc: Veronica ecoute Rodrigo interroger Gertrudis. Celle-ci commence avouer tous les crimes commis San Pedro del Oro.

programme.title: Miami Vice

programme.title: Black Warrant
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Tom Berenger stars in this action-packed thriller. A semi-retired assassin and DEA agent team up to stop a cyber terrorist organisation.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.title: Crescent Gang
programme.desc: A heartwarming family film. A group of kids in foster care embark on a scavenger hunt to save their home when they learn it is being sold and they will be separated.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Russell Brand drives this remake of an 80s classic. A rich playboy must choose between a marriage that will ensure his lavish lifestyle or a financially uncertain future with his true love.

programme.title: Shes All That
programme.desc: Freddie Prinze Jr. (Head Over Heels) stars in this high school romcom. After a popular boy in school gets dumped, he makes a bet that he can turn a nerd into a prom queen.

programme.title: The Break Up
programme.desc: Former real-life couple Vince Vaughn and Jennifer Aniston play a once-happy twosome who go to war after breaking up - with things getting nastier by the day.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield returns for a second round of web-slinging action. Dangerous new enemies and family secrets weigh heavy on young Peter Parker as he struggles with his destiny.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: Chaos fills this comedy starring Eddie Murphy and Ben Stiller. When a group of employees discovers that they are victims of their bosss Ponzi scheme, they decide to rob him.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: Emmy-winning actor Bob Odenkirk leads this action thriller as an unassuming man who is driven to the edge after a home invasion. He goes into a rage to protect his family.

programme.title: The Protege
programme.desc: Maggie Q leads this all-star cast in this action movie. When the mentor of the worlds best contract killer is killed, she vows to avenge the man who taught her everything.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Colin Farrell takes centre stage in this dark crime comedy. After a job gone wrong, two Irish hitmen are told to lay low in Belgium, but they find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: White People Money
programme.desc: In this hilarious satire, a couple learns that having a lot of money comes with many troubles after they win $1 billion and try to keep it a secret from everyone.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Gary Oldman won the Oscar for his portrayal of iconic British Prime Minister Winston Churchill in this biopic. During WWII, he debates whether to negotiate with Hitler or fight on.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning romantic drama based on a F. Scott Fitzgerald story. Brad Pitt stars as a man born already in his eighties who must live his life ageing in reverse.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: A nail-biting survival thriller. After climbing an abandoned 2000-foot radio tower, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves trapped at the top with no way down.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson leads this larger-than-life monster movie. After animals are infected by a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop their deadly rampage.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Justin Lin adds a new flavour to this thrilling franchise. A troubled teen is sent to live with his dad in Tokyo, there, he learns about a new type of racing.

programme.title: Alien Sniperess
programme.desc: An alien invasion action film. A female sniper on military leave encounters a hostile alien invasion and must save lives.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain is both intelligent and thrilling in this suspenseful film about the hunt for Osama bin Laden and a CIA operative who believes shes discovered his whereabouts.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy plays a titan of industry who is sent to prison after shes caught for insider trading.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Steve Carell plays a nice guy who has lived his whole life without doing it, but now his misguided pals are helping him to score and maybe even find true love.

programme.title: Interview with the Vampire...
programme.sub-title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
programme.desc: A 200-year-old vampire tells his story to a young reporter, weaving the history that has come to be known as Interview With The Vampire.

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: The day he got his 3,000th big league hit, Stan Ross walked away from the game believing hed punched his ticket to the Hall of Fame.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: When high-powered book editor faces deportation back to Canada, she declares that shes actually engaged to her put-upon assistant who shes tormented for years.

programme.title: I Am Sam
programme.desc: Can a mentally challenged man be a good father? Sean Penn and Michelle Pfeiffer star in the moving story of unconditional love that grows between a man, his daughter and the attorney.

programme.title: Life In A Year
programme.desc: The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.

programme.title: Hitch
